title: SeedStore
description: Seedstore is a modern application designed to streamline the process of managing and distributing seeds for agriculture and gardening. With Seedstore, users can browse, purchase, and manage a variety of seeds while ensuring a smooth and efficient user experience.

title: Token Swapp
description: Entrylaunch is a specialized job board platform designed to connect freshers with employers, featuring distinct roles for admin, employer, and employee, with secure login and management functionalities.

title: Pharma Chain
description: A blockchain-based pharmaceutical supply chain project that uses Hyperledger Fabric to ensure secure, transparent drug tracking across manufacturers, wholesalers, pharmacies, and regulators, enhancing trust and safety throughout the supply chain.

title: Course Hub
description: Course Hub is a MERN stack project with features to manage courses (add, view, delete, update) and role-based access control, granting admins full access and regular users view-only permissions.

title: Certificate Application
description: A decentralized application (DApp) that allows users to issue and verify certificates using blockchain technology. This application is built with React, Solidity, and Ethereum blockchain via Infura.

title: EntryLaunch
description: Entrylaunch is a specialized job board platform designed to connect freshers with employers, featuring distinct roles for admin, employer, and employee, with secure login and management functionalities.
